meta.name: Oliver Ma 馬賦馳
meta.about: Support my Patreon and/or Website NOW! 👇

meta.name: Oliver Ma
meta.about:
Oliver Ma is a 20-year-old mixed Chinese-Filipino. Born in January 21,1999 and raised from a humble beginning in Hong Kong, he aspires to be one of the biggest stars in the world.

As year 2019 started, he had crossed paths with Chris J. Lee and John Razalo, who now play major roles in co-producing his cover collections and music videos respectively.

As of July 7, 2019, Ma announced his cover LPs “...Ready For It? (STUDIO Cover Collection)” and “...Ready For It? (Studio ACAPELLA Collection)” on his Instagram, which were finally released across all music streaming platforms on July 21,2019. Ma would also post 1 music video and 1 behind-the-scenes video every other week on his YouTube channel to accompany each track on his “...Ready For It? (STUDIO Cover Collection).”
